---
title: "GotoAction"
description: "Goto to a URL (in current tab)"
---



**Example:**
```python
from notte_sdk import actions

session.execute(actions.Goto(url="https://www.google.com"))
```

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

</ParamField>

`notte_core.actions`
